com.avos.avoscloud

类 AVGeoPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avos.avoscloud.AVGeoPoint

  • public class AVGeoPoint
extends java.lang.Object

    AVGeoPoint represents a latitude / longitude point that may be associated with a key in a AVObject or used as a reference point for geo queries. This allows proximity based queries on the key.

    Only one key in a class may contain a GeoPoint.

    Example: 
     AVGeoPoint point = new AVGeoPoint(30.0, -20.0);
 AVObject object = new AVObject("PlaceObject");
 object.put("location", point);
 object.save();

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      AVGeoPoint()
      Creates a new default point with latitude and longitude set to 0.0.
      AVGeoPoint(double latitude, double longitude)
      Creates a new point with the specified latitude and longitude.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      double distanceInKilometersTo(AVGeoPoint point)
      Get distance between this point and another geopoint in kilometers.
      double distanceInMilesTo(AVGeoPoint point)
      Get distance between this point and another geopoint in kilometers.
      double distanceInRadiansTo(AVGeoPoint point)
      Get distance in radians between this point and another GeoPoint.
      double getLatitude()
      Get latitude.
      double getLongitude()
      Get longitude.
      void setLatitude(double l)
      Set latitude.
      void setLongitude(double l)
      Set longitude.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AVGeoPoint

        public AVGeoPoint()
        Creates a new default point with latitude and longitude set to 0.0.

      • AVGeoPoint

        public AVGeoPoint(double latitude,
          double longitude)
        Creates a new point with the specified latitude and longitude.
        参数:
        latitude - The point's latitude.
        longitude - The point's longitude.

    • 方法详细资料

      • distanceInKilometersTo

        public double distanceInKilometersTo(AVGeoPoint point)
        Get distance between this point and another geopoint in kilometers.
        参数:
        point - GeoPoint describing the other point being measured against.

      • distanceInMilesTo

        public double distanceInMilesTo(AVGeoPoint point)
        Get distance between this point and another geopoint in kilometers.
        参数:
        point - GeoPoint describing the other point being measured against.

      • distanceInRadiansTo

        public double distanceInRadiansTo(AVGeoPoint point)
        Get distance in radians between this point and another GeoPoint. This is the smallest angular distance between the two points.
        参数:
        point - GeoPoint describing the other point being measured against.

      • getLatitude

        public double getLatitude()
        Get latitude.

      • setLatitude

        public void setLatitude(double l)
        Set latitude. Valid range is (-90.0, 90.0). Extremes should not be used.
        参数:
        l - The point's latitude.

      • getLongitude

        public double getLongitude()
        Get longitude.

      • setLongitude

        public void setLongitude(double l)
        Set longitude. Valid range is (-180.0, 180.0). Extremes should not be used.
        参数:
        l - The point's longitude.
